roleset.name: to make obscure or confused
roleset.note: MUDDY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'muddy' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from muddy.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [His `` Mr. Clean '' image]-1 was muddied [*-1]by an arms-kickback scandal , which [*T*-2] will be a major campaign issue .
example.arg: by an arms-kickback scandal , which [*T*-2] will be a major campaign issue
